Name: Terrorform
About the game: Mad scientists have released ungodly abominations from their testing facilities. A security guard put on ice, only to be thawed in case of EXTREME emergency, you wake up with one thought in mind........killing. With the help of a tech expert, Art, you need to make your way through this lab from the pits of hell and put a stop to these monsters. CLASSIC FPS CONTROLS Looking up is overrated anyways. If you are here for a classic FPS feel, you're in the right hands. Don't worry, we took all the feel of a classic Boomer Shooter and jammed packed it with the speed and high paced gameplay of modern shooters. It's a Frankenstein and you'll love it. FULL ARSENAL Six weapons with dramatically different mechanics. Wanna shoot grapple lasers? Got it! Wanna unload a full mag into some eyeball? Got that too! What about a tried and true shotgun? Oh you know we wouldn't leave that out. THREE GRUSOME ACTS Kick monster ass through three acts, 15 levels, and 3 unique bosses. There is something not right on in this testing facility, will you get to the bottom of it? Who cares, you're here to leave a pile of bodies on your way out. CHALLENGE MODE Test your weapon mastery in a challenge mode. Race against the clock to beat a procedurally generated set of 5 levels with endless combinations. Did I mention, you only get 1 weapon.....good luck.
